amendment.description: To provide funding to study and combat harmful algal blooms.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3551 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3551 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5500) To provide funding to study and combat harmful algal blooms.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3551 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3551 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
